articles.author: Hudson Lockett
articles.title: Chinese stocks jump after Beijing cuts trading levy for first time since 2008 - Financial Times
articles.description: Optimism tempered by 80% drop in property group Evergrande’s shares
articles.content: Chinese stocks rallied on Monday after regulators cut a levy on stock trades for the first time since the 2008 financial crisis and pledged to slow the pace of initial public offerings in an effort t… [+2747 chars]
